desc: Loki woke up. After quick glance he noticed he is not in a room, or even outside. Everywhere he can see just plain white color. 'Am I dead?' Loki said out loud. 'No, you are very much alive' said familiar voice from above his head. Just when Loki was about to ask a followup question the voice materialized in front of him. It was the same angel that talked him into killing other gods.
